message: Try to recognize your anger, identify its cause, identify whether or not the situation requires you to speak up,  and allow yourself to speak or behave in a way that acknowledges and honors your feelings.ğŸ˜“ğŸ¤—ğŸ‘©

Accept that you will feel anger, that it might occasionally get the best of you, and that itâ€™s okay if it does. Simply stifling your anger will make it far worse. Taking deep, even breaths can help in this process as it can center both your mind and your body and allow you to more accurately identify what you are angry about or who you are angry with. ğŸ¥ºğŸ˜«ğŸ˜–

Performing routine (anger maintenance) can prove helpful as well. Healthy eating, regular exercise, and daily meditation can all improve anger and stress responses, which may allow you to recognize, channel more effectively, and utilize your anger. Although angry women have long been reviled or considered cute, your inner angry woman deserves to enjoy a calm, safe environment wherein anger is regarded as a tool, rather than an unwelcome guest.ğŸ˜ ğŸ˜¤ğŸ˜Š

Avoiding fears only makes them scarier. Whatever your fear, if you face it, it should start to fade.Keep in mind that  just because something feels scary, it doesnâ€™t mean itâ€™s actually risky .
Educate yourself about the facts and the risks you actually face by doing the things that scare you If you panic one day getting into a lift, for example, it's best to get back into a lift the next day.

Many of us feel that our lives must be perfect. Bad days and setbacks will always happen, and it's important to remember that life is messy.
The first thing to do is take time out so you can physically calm down.Distract yourself from the worry for 15 minutes by walking around the block ğŸš¶â€â™€ï¸, making a cup of tea ğŸµ or having a bath ğŸ›€.

If you start to get a faster heartbeat or sweating palms, the best thing is not to fight it.Stay where you are and simply feel the panic without trying to distract yourself. Place the palm of your hand on your stomach and breathe slowly and deeply.
Be silly. Be fun. Be different. Be crazy. Be you, because life is too short to be anything but happy.ğŸ™‚ğŸ™ƒğŸ‘»

You are powerful, confident and beautiful. I really want you to know that you are strong and that life is about to give you a million reasons to be happy. You will just need to stop being sad. Get up, cheer up and tackle the world.

Life is much more than what you have explored and witnessed. This is not the time to be sad or lonely. You are living the best days of your life and if you spend this beautiful time being sad, you will never have anything to look back upon and remember fondly when you grow older.

This insurmountable emotional energy you feel is dynamic. You can turn your sadness to happiness. You,  woman, are a powerhouse of emotional energy and you need to use it to your advantage. No matter what life throws at you, you can convert it into something good and positive.
Try it! Do it! And if you ever fail, know that you can always get up on your feet and start again.

Sometimes there are valid reasons to get madğŸ˜¤.Harness your angry energy. Sign a petition. Write a note to an officialâœï¸ . Do something good for someone elseğŸ˜‡. Pour your energy and emotions into something thatâ€™s healthy and productive.

Anger control is important for helping you avoid saying or doing something you may regret.Before anger escalates, take slow, deep breaths ğŸ˜®â€ğŸ’¨ from your nose and exhale out of your mouth for several moments then repeat gentle phrases to yourself like â€œtake it easyâ€ â€œcool offâ€ .

Try to replace negative, angry thoughts  with positive, rational ones. Even if youâ€™re feeling upset, remind yourself that getting angry isnâ€™t going to fix the way that youâ€™re feeling.

Life is much more than what you have explored and witnessed. This is not the time to be sad or lonely. You are living the best days of your life and if you spend this beautiful time being sad, you will never have anything to look back upon and remember fondly when you grow older.

This insurmountable emotional energy you feel is dynamic. You can turn your sadness to happiness. You,  woman, are a powerhouse of emotional energy and you need to use it to your advantage. No matter what life throws at you, you can convert it into something good and positive.
Try it! Do it! And if you ever fail, know that you can always get up on your feet and start again.
